THE DEAL X DYSON
PRIVATE STAFF SALE STARTS TOMORROW!

Date: 10 - 13 December

THE FASHION LAB ANNOUNCES 2024 SAUDI COHORT

To celebrate, the 10 Saudi brands participated in a stunning photoshoot with Khamsa Publication, attended expert-led sessions, and showcased their collections at an exciting evening launch. Read more <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%252fpost%252fNjg5%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWYSLKUg7SRr7T6frbRYcDFdMXnskKfHyg0ob%252f%252fStSLlDxzQ5gJmTWqYYsin%252beygwmo6JlrRmVEG8gN4VcMX11oUGff7MiusyJVG%252b8Zr6fD5dtIgJMQJux2lwCRS92ARNPg1KqmBcinMVM4vrw%252fTOgejoU5jfMxRjTa1MvvCPN%252fTE2qs662sMldaTFDayTvoXXiXQZUQyl2z5epUHewgK8dKYUFDM7GlUAsYR%252f26Cfar4&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ca22ab3f3118846db4f4908dd184c5367%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638693438282467591%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=D8nFoYzfaSkmbRuoNC2RnQDC6AFUbCMYGXZVRBrojSQ%3D&reserved=0>

chunks.text:
WELCOMING SADAF SHEIKH & CHARLIE HAGUE'S INTERNAL MOBILITY

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/dmABJQCcpkO8du3hRBDOZQ/550716/390E71C2DF7F7B5719D003C88D03CB5D/untitled-design-2024-12-09t140815-152.png> 	
Sadaf Sheikh has joined the Group as a Senior Executive Assistant to Wassim Eid, President of People & Culture, succeeding Charlie Hague, who has moved internally within the Group. Sadaf brings a wealth of expertise, organisational skills, and an unwavering commitment to excellence. Read more <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%252farticle%252fwelcoming-sadaf-sheikh-charlie-hague-s-internal-mobility%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWYSLKUg7SRr7T6frbRYcDFdMXnskKfHyg0ob%252f%252fStSLlDxzQ5gJmTWqYYsin%252beygwmo6JlrRmVEG8gN4VcMX11oUGff7MiusyJVG%252b8Zr6fD5dtIgJMQJux2lwCRS92ARNPg1KqmBcinMVM4vrw%252fTOgejoU5jfMxRjTa1MvvCPN%252fTE2qs662sMldaTFDayTvoXXiXQZUQyl2z5epUHewgK8dKYUFDM7GlUAsYR%252f26Cfar4&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ca22ab3f3118846db4f4908dd184c5367%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638693438282481791%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=bOGEI%2BZwpsYQ4ZI%2BLZoRzYZpuBxGx7bZyKII0LMDu5Y%3D&reserved=0>

chunks.text: Charlie has transitioned into a new role as Project Manager in the Talent Management team. Over the past 2.5 years with the Group, Charlie worked closely with all P&C teams and gained extensive knowledge of the business and HR functions. She will now leverage this expertise to support the Talent Management team. Read more <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%252farticle%252fwelcoming-sadaf-sheikh-charlie-hague-s-internal-mobility%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWYSLKUg7SRr7T6frbRYcDFdMXnskKfHyg0ob%252f%252fStSLlDxzQ5gJmTWqYYsin%252beygwmo6JlrRmVEG8gN4VcMX11oUGff7MiusyJVG%252b8Zr6fD5dtIgJMQJux2lwCRS92ARNPg1KqmBcinMVM4vrw%252fTOgejoU5jfMxRjTa1MvvCPN%252fTE2qs662sMldaTFDayTvoXXiXQZUQyl2z5epUHewgK8dKYUFDM7GlUAsYR%252f26Cfar4&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ca22ab3f3118846db4f4908dd184c5367%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638693438282496538%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=n%2Fv01ax6fl%2B%2F8IRWwyxy0pXDTD1eBlGAS9KvZH7W61w%3D&reserved=0>
